name: S'ence Runner
description:
In S'ence Runner you take on the role of a hard working crypto miner inspired by the words of international crypto superstar Felon Husk.  With your crypto-mining jetpack you can generate S'ence cryptocurrency just by scorching the world around you with the jetpack's flames!

Play through three levels, upgrade your rig, and collect NFTs in your quest to impress Felon Husk by being the first to acquire *1,000* S'ence coins!

This game was developed by:

Krowmagg.itch.io -Art

red-panda-productions.itch.io -Art

rHatt.itchio -Game Design

Albert Leo -Narrative Design

lisamichele.itch.io -Sound Design

rilantes.itch.io -Programming

It was made for the Budding Game Devs Spring 2022 Buddy Up Jam!
